To compare the relative prevalence of ART use among migrating populations and long-term residents, we used Poisson regression with robust variance to estimate prevalence risk ratios (PRR) and corresponding 95% confidence intervals (CI). The sensitivity of our results to differential survey participation by age, gender, and community of residence was assessed using inverse probability weighting as previously described
